description:
NEXT.exchange describes itself as a hybrid exchange that combines Proof-of-Stake and Proof-of-Work technology to create a blockchain structure that is reportedly capable of handling up to 100k transactions / second to support the following features: NEXT.exchange describes itself as a hybrid exchange that combines Proof-of-Stake and Proof-of-Work technology to create a blockchain structure that is reportedly capable of handling up to 100k transactions / second to support the following features:
  • Fee redistributions to NEXT holders
  • Asset tokenization & creation
  • Masternodes.
  • SHA 256 Merged Mining with Bitcoin.
  • Initial Exchange Offerings
  • Security Token Offerings
  • P2P trading
name: Next.exchange
